name: House of Puzzles Full Game
description:
An amazing way to relax your mind, develop your focus and recuperate from mental fatigue. Relax in 3 different environments and enjoy a selection of 3 relaxing melodies as you assemble awesome 3d jigsaw puzzles. For an extra challenge try to complete the puzzle with no gravity! This game is for the Meta Quest.

Play the demo here:

https://sidequestvr.com/app/9390/house-of-puzzles-demo


Puzzles:

Earth - 31 pieces

Cheetah - 33 pieces

Zebra - 47 pieces

Hippo - 62 pieces

Giraffe - 77 pieces

Gorilla - 77 pieces

African Buffalo - 79 pieces

Rhino - 83 pieces
